articles.description: Cal Quantrill's record fell to 2-6 after allowing five runs and 11 hits in 4 1/3 innings. The Guards once again failed to get back to .500.
articles.content: CLEVELAND All-Stars Sean Murphy and Matt Olson homered as the Atlanta Braves bounced back from one of their rare losses over the past month by smashing the Cleveland Guardians 8-1 on Wednesday night.… [+3285 chars]

articles.author: Brandon Contes
articles.title: ESPN announcer made Supreme Court joke during Joey Chestnut’s dominant hot dog-eating performance - Awful Announcing
articles.description: There are only so many ways to give play-by-play of a person eating 62 hot dogs, which means ESPN announcers have to get creative.
articles.content:
There are only so many ways to give a play-by-play of a person eating 62 hot dogs in ten minutes, which means ESPN announcers have to get creative during the Nathans Hot Dog Eating Contest.
